ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFITradeAccountContract.Code AS Code, ESFITradeAccountContract.Description AS Description, ESFITradeAccountContract.GID AS GID, ESFITradeAccountContract.FromDate AS FromDate, ESFITradeAccountContract.ToDate AS ToDate, ESFITradeAccountContract.SignDate AS SignDate, ESFITradeAccountContract.fTradeAccountGID AS fTradeAccountGID FROM ESFITradeAccountContract AS ESFITradeAccountContract WHERE (ESFITradeAccountContract.Inactive = 0) AND (ESFITradeAccountContract.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (ESEqual(ESFITradeAccountContract.fTradeAccountGID, @fTradeAccountGID1))
